channel.title: Blog on hannahs.ddns.net
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on hannahs.ddns.net

item.title: Post #2
item.description: Boy was that a depressing first post! Wow! I got a 410 open the other day — that was pretty cool. Does that make me an intermediate lockpicker? Gauging my own skill at something — that’s pretty hard to do. I don’t know if I can do that so well. As well, with a niche hobby it’s hard to know how good anyone else is. I really want to teach someone to pick locks.

item.title: First Post
item.description: So I’m starting a blog I guess. Very exciting. Love to blog. I guess why I’m doing this is the feeling like I need to own my own space a bit more. Like a lot of what I do every day and encounter and stuff, I don’t own. Is that… I don’t know if that’s even a problem. Is it problem that I don’t own where I live, what I work on?
